page.title: 10STRANGE STORIES
page.content: { THE GREY LADY OF FIGHELDEAN. One day an airman,who had permission to play the organ, was in the church at about 10 o'clock. He suddenly saw a grey figure walking towards him, it continued till it reached the altar. He was so frightened he would never enter the church again. { PETER WITCHELL. Recently a farmhouse was having central heating put in for new owners The workmen were terrified when they saw a figure huddled in a corner. After describing what they had seen villagers surprised them by saying they had accurately described the farmer who had previously lived there. The workmen refused to finish the job.
